ComicInfo.Summary:
In the second of our two-part finale, the Hyrkanian forces clashes, sister against brother, in bloody civil war for the Falcon Throne. Revelations, explosions, betrayals, and triumph await as the soul of Hyrkania – and Sonja herself – hang in the balance.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------------|--------------------|------------------| | A/Reg | Regular Cover | Marguerite Sauvage | 1 | | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Marguerite Sauvage | 2 | | C/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Marguerite Sauvage | 3 |
